name: Circuitus
description: Circuitus is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its sleek design and vibrant red color inspired by the famous rossoCorsa shade, Circuitus stands out among its robotic peers. Its classic buttons add a touch of nostalgia, reminiscent of retro technology. Equipped with arms and legs made from durable foundry materials, Circuitus is both sturdy and agile. Its screen, adorned with a cute cat image, adds a playful element to its overall appearance. With its eye-catching design and advanced functionality, Circuitus combines style and substance in the world of robotics.
